attributes.action: Raising the legal age of buying and consuming alcohol to 20
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the current problem i would like the goverment to raise the legal age of buying and consuming alcohol to 20 because 
i'am 16 and it really does my head in when i see teens walking around getting drunk and drinking alcohol as if it is a normal drink that causes no harm to them or to others.

Please sign below if you agree with me wanting to raise the legal age for it.

Thank you
